Feature_meaning: The app's ability to run on various devices and operating systems.
The app's ability to live streaming sports events through the app.
The app's ability to send alerts and notifications to users about games
The app's design and layout including ease of navigation.
The presence and frequency of advertisements in the app.
The app's quality and responsiveness of the customer support.
The app's ability to provide real-time scores and updates for games.
The app's resolution and overall quality of the video streams.
The app's ability to customize the settings
column4: such as selecting favorite teams or sports.

Feature_meaning: The app's requirement for a paid subscription to access certain content or features.
The app's ability to cast content to a TV using Chromecast.
The app's ability to integrate with other services
column4: such as social media or cable providers.

Feature_meaning: The app's variety of types of sports and leagues and coverage of playoffs and blackouts.
